content: Many of his attacks can then transition into two quick claw swipes with each hand where his arms will remain across his body, and after a moment, will violently lash out with both arms and an outward cross slash you can try to Immobilize to stop. Rock Solid can also help, but it’s unlikely to stagger him out of the move.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Rattle-Drum_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Old Rattle-Drum Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Battle - Mad Tiger'.
The content is as follows:
Many of his attacks can then transition into two quick claw swipes with each hand where his arms will remain across his body, and after a moment, will violently lash out with both arms and an outward cross slash you can try to Immobilize to stop. Rock Solid can also help, but it’s unlikely to stagger him out of the move.
